Package org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy.load

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiffuserLoadCalc
    Represents the CPU load in a similar way to Unix load: 0.0 means no load 1.0 means work is perfectly balanced with CPU resources (this isn't necessarily the threshold value which the load shouldn't surpass, that may by 0.7 or so.) Greater than 1.0 means the load is too high.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SystemAverageCpuLoadCalc
    Uses the system's average CPU load based on the OperatingSystemMXBean.getSystemLoadAverage() method.
    SystemCpuLoadCalc
    TODO fix this class to give the system CPU load.
    TaskCpuLoadCalc
    Load calculator that uses the number of tasks running in the cache divided by the number of processors available on the machine.
    TaskThreadLoadCalc
    Calculates the load based on the number of running tasks (in the specified cache) divided by the number of threads available in the thread-pool (usually for the ExecutorService.
